common.homeText: Use the navigation bar above to reach the the page you want.
common.loginText: You need to login to access the content of {{from}}
common.duplicateCandidate: This candidate has already been added.
common.upload: Choose a json file from your computer:
common.notJson: The file needs to have the .json extension.
common.create: Create a new election by filling out the information below or by uploading a json file
common.errorCandidates: You must add at least one candidate!
common.errorNewCandidate: Are you sure you don't want to add
common.errorRetrievingElection: An error seems to have occurred while retrieving all the elections from our server. Contact the administrator of this website.
common.errorRetrievingKey: An error seems to have occurred while retrieving the public key from our server. Contact the administrator of this website.
common.errorServerDown: One of our servers seems to be down. Contact the administrator of this website.
common.clickElection: Click on the election name to display additional details.
common.listElection: This page lists all the elections that have ever been created.
common.title: Title
common.confirmCloseElection: Are you sure you want to close this election?
common.confirmCancelElection: Are you sure you want to cancel this election?
common.changeVote: You can change your vote by simply casting a new vote.
common.voteFailure: Your ballot hasn't been taken into account. It might be that the election has been closed or cancelled. Try refreshing the page.
common.minSelectError: You need to select at least {{min}} {{singularPlural}}.
common.maxSelectError: You cannot select more than {{max}} answers.
common.minTextError: You need to fill at least {{minText}} {{singularPlural}}.
common.regexpCheck: Answer must be of the form: {{regexp}}.
common.noVote: There is currently nothing to vote on.
common.voteAllowed: You are allowed to vote on the election(s) below. Click on an election title to display its ballot and vote.
common.displayResults: The results of the election(s) listed below are available. Click on an election title to access them.
common.noResultsAvailable: There is currently no available results.
common.notEnoughBallot: The operation failed because less than two ballots have been casted.
common.operationFailure: The operation failed. Try refreshing the page.
common.voteImpossible: The election is not open for voting anymore.
common.about1: This website hosts the interface of an evoting system. This system runs smart contracts, handled by a set of Byzantine fault-tolerant nodes.
common.about2: When an administrator creates an election, the election parameters are saved on a blockchain and so are every following transaction (closing/cancelling election, casting a vote,...).
common.about3: A distributed key is generated at election creation time so that when a user votes, his/her vote is encrypted with the key guarantying the anonymity of the vote. However the system doesn't enforce the anonymity of the voter.
common.about4: When an election is closed, the nodes shuffle the ballots and check its correctness before decrypting the shuffle and publish the result of the election on a smart contract.
